title: WTB: Harper's Woodcut of Metrpolitan Base-Ball Nine
author: cdn_collector

posts.post_title: WTB: Harper's Woodcut of Metrpolitan Base-Ball Nine
posts.post_content:
Evening folks,

Never really paid much attention to Harper's woodcuts before, but realized yesterday this could be an affordable way to get an early image of Tip O'Neill.

Would love to get my hands on the August 5, 1882 Harper's of the Metropolitan Baseball Nine if anyone has one for sale.

Thanks!

Richard.
[url]richard@richardarmstrong.ca[/url]
